services.name: Machine Condition Monitoring Service
services.description: This service monitors the operational health of industrial machinery in real-time using IoT sensors and predictive analytics, reducing downtime.

services.name: Supply Chain Management Service
services.description: Designed for the coordination and optimization of industrial goods flow, this service provides tools for inventory tracking and order processing.

services.name: Construction Project Management Service
services.description: Aimed at the construction sector, this service supports scheduling, resource allocation, and cost management, ensuring project efficiency.

services.name: Environmental Compliance Reporting Service
services.description: This service assists in tracking and reporting environmental emissions and compliance metrics, helping industries meet regulatory requirements.

services.name: Employee Training and Certification Service
services.description: This service offers a platform for workforce skill assessments, training module delivery, and certification management for industrial organizations.
